about_the_game:
What is the Premium Upgrade?

Poly Plaza Premium Upgrade will enable you to collect automatically all your rent. You will not need to go and collect them manually and they will arrive directly, in realtime on your bank account. In addition to the rent collecting automatically, you will also earn double XP on all your actions.

Features

  • Collect your rent automatically

  • Earn double exp on everything you do

  • OS *: Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM)

  • OS: Windows® 11
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 3.6 GHz or higher: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or Intel i5-8600K or newer
